Interface IAccountView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IObserver
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountView

    public interface IAccountView
extends IObserver
    The IAccountView interface exposes all the functionality required from the account controller.

    • Method Summary

      void setSelection(java.lang.Integer id)
      Overrides the UI and sets the user's current account selection to the one with the specified id
